rules_text:
Whenever a noncreature permanent is put into an opponents graveyard from the battlefield, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[i]Delirium[/i] – {2}{B}{G}: Another target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this only if you have four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
_
rules_text2:
When J'laik deals combat damage to a player, each player mills four cards.
[i]Delirium[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, as long as you have four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, up to one other target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.
_
